an3.140:1.1: “Tayo ca, bhikkhave, assakhalunke desessami tayo ca purisakhalunke.
an3.140:1.2: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
an3.140:1.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
an3.140:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco assakhalunko javasampanno hoti; na vannasampanno, na arohaparinahasampanno.
an3.140:2.3: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco assakhalunko javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca; na arohaparinahasampanno.
an3.140:2.4: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco assakhalunko javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an3.140:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco purisakhalunko javasampanno hoti; na vannasampanno, na arohaparinahasampanno.
an3.140:3.3: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco purisakhalunko javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca; na arohaparinahasampanno.
an3.140:3.4: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco purisakhalunko javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an3.140:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, purisakhalunko javasampanno hoti; na vannasampanno na arohaparinahasampanno?
an3.140:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an3.140:4.4: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye panham puttho samsadeti, no vissajjeti.
an3.140:4.8: Evam kho, bhikkhave, purisakhalunko javasampanno hoti; na vannasampanno, na arohaparinahasampanno.
an3.140:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, purisakhalunko javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca; na arohaparinahasampanno?
an3.140:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an3.140:5.4: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye panham puttho vissajjeti, no samsadeti.
an3.140:5.8: Evam kho, bhikkhave, purisakhalunko javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca; na arohaparinahasampanno.
an3.140:6.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, purisakhalunko javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca?
an3.140:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an3.140:6.4: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye panham puttho vissajjeti, no samsadeti.
an3.140:6.8: Evam kho, bhikkhave, purisakhalunko javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
